level.heading: Relocation of recipients to another jurisdiction.
level.text: Recipients of assistance from the District who move to another jurisdiction with intent to remain in that State shall be ineligible to receive assistance from the District immediately upon the date of the recipient's last day of residency in the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-101
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-101, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.

level.heading: Expiration of law Expiration of Law 11-72
